data.actual_result: It crashes both regular websocket and voice chat (if you are in one)
data.expected_result: It should properly handle the invalid jump without crashing the websocket
data.short_description: If you click on a mentioned channel that just got deleted or you left the server OR clicking on a copy message link from a server you are not part of, the websocket will crash.
data.steps_to_repro: - Mention a channel - Leave the server where the channel belongs to without leaving the channel where you mentioned that channel - Click on it - Observe the console - OR - Ask someone to send a "Copy link" link to you to a server you are not part of. (channel wont work) - Click on it then observe console
